name: n8n-chat-widget
description: Customizable chat widget for n8n webhooks with streaming support

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar 'src/**/*' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: adradr
